title: Empathetic Listening Simulation Training for Postpartum Nursing Care

context.prior_knowledge: Basic postpartum nursing knowledge and clinical experience
context.additional_context: Hands-on VR simulation-based education in BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) environments

learning_goals: Apply empathetic listening techniques to identify the emotional needs of postpartum women with 80% accuracy.
Practice communication strategies for postpartum depression patients in a VR simulation at least three times.
Explain the patient assessment procedure using the Edinburgh Postnatal Depression Scale (EPDS).
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
